description: Triangle of differences of reciprocals of unity.
references: F. N. David, M. G. Kendall and D. E. Barton, Symmetric Function and Allied Tables, Cambridge, 1966, p. 228.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..45, flattened
maple: T:= (n,k)-> `if`(k<=n, (n-k+2)!^k *add ((-1)^(j+1) *binomial(n-k+2, j)/ j^k, j=1..n-k+2), 0): seq (seq (T(n,k), k=0..n), n=0..7); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 05 2008
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := If[k <= n, (n-k+2)!^k*Sum[(-1)^(j+1)*Binomial[n-k+2, j]/j^k, {j, 1, n-k+2}], 0]; Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 7}] // Flatten (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Mar 10 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
crossrefs: Columns include A000254, A000424, A001236, A001237, A001238. Right-hand columns include A000225, A001240, A001241, A001242.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
